overview: At the Cock 'n' Bull, the food is good but the service is even better — thanks to the nude waiters! These studs are only too willing to crawl under your table… or meet you in the private "wine cellar." Be sure to check out the kitchen, where two dudes are concocting a unique "beef stew" with the hunky cook. The place is packed with hungry and horny customers just waiting for the perfect piece of meat to come to their table. After the main course has been served, the real smorgasbord begins: an after-lunch orgy to start your afternoon off right.
tagline: Dining out has never been so delicious!
title: Naked Lunch
